caseTitle: Munawar Hussain Bukhari v. Appellate Authority/Tribunal/ASJ, Alipur, District Muzaffargarh & others
tagline: For the purposes of attracting disqualification under section 27(2)(e) of the Punjab Local Government Act, 2013, it is to be seen that the candidate or the elected member of the local body is in the service of "statutory body" or "body", which is owned and controlled by or that controlling share or interest therein is of Federal, Provincial or Local Government.
